scripts.postinstall: mkdir -p public/ort-wasm && cp node_modules/onnxruntime-web/dist/*.wasm public/ort-wasm/ 2>/dev/null || true && cp node_modules/onnxruntime-web/dist/*.mjs public/ort-wasm/ 2>/dev/null || true && cp node_modules/onnxruntime-web/dist/*.worker.js public/ort-wasm/ 2>/dev/null || true && cp node_modules/onnxruntime-web/dist/*.js public/ort-wasm/ 2>/dev/null || true
